questions.question: Wildfires continue to rage in western United States, e.g. California. Who is the governor of California?
Ruth Bader Ginsburg, 87, has passed away after battling metastatic pancreatic cancer. Who was she?

choices.answer: Secretary General of the United Nations
legendary inventor of the modern computer router
U.S. Supreme Court Justice; women's rights champion
first female Prime Minister of the UK

questions.question: Sally, yet another hurricane, wreaked havoc on the U.S. Gulf and East Coasts. How do hurricanes get their names?

choices.answer: from a box of names, meteorologists pick the name
from preset lists with alternating male and female names
country officials where the storm first hits decide
from a list of names ratified by the UN General Assembly

questions.question: It's 100 years since women got the right to vote in the US but where were women's rights first legalized? (1893)
What is the best definition of suffrage?

choices.answer: women's right to file for divorce
the right to run for political office
the right to vote in public elections

questions.question: OTC means "over-the-counter medicine". What is another way of defining an OTC drug?
You may have heard the expression Murphy's Law. What is meant by Murphy's Law?

choices.answer: If you succeed in one area, you'll succeed in all
Murphy's famous law about kids and candy
Anything that can go wrong, will go wrong
If you are attacked, you strike back

questions.question: The English Women's Super League (WSL) may be the best league after recent signings. Who signed American Alex Morgan?
Duplantis did it again, this time breaking Sergei Bubka's pole vault record from 1994. How high did Mondo jump?
24KGoldn features on a new song by Clean Bandit & Mabel. What is the song called?
The filmThe Personal History of David Copperfield is a modern take on a classic story. Who wrote the book? (1850)
Antebellum is a thriller about an author trapped in a horrifying reality. Who is the actress playing author?
